english.segment1: He never thought he cared so much about the minute hand. Until he started praying for, a second chance. If he could only do it all again. He'd trade the long nights that he spent behind his desk. For all he missed
english.segment2: He tells his wife "I wish that this moment in this room was not me dying, but just spending a little time with you."
english.segment3: You only get just one time around. You only get one shot at this. One chance, to find out. The one thing that you don't wanna miss. One day when it's all said and done. I hope you see that it was enough, this. One ride, one try, one life.. To love..
